content:
I'm looking to remove Ord and PartialOrd from LocalExpnId, per #90317.

LocalExpnId is defined here using the macro rustc_index::newtype_index, which does the implementating of Ord.

Here @cjgillot suggests "mak[ing] the ordering traits opt-out in newtype_index macro, like we do with encodable/decodable traits." (Meaning here?)

My macro foo is _very weak_.

Can anyone offer a clue on how to make this implementation "opt-out"?
